member.name: T:PropertyChanged.AlsoNotifyForAttribute
member.summary: Injects this property to be notified when a dependent property is set.

member.name: M:PropertyChanged.AlsoNotifyForAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.param: A property that will be notified for.

member.name: M:PropertyChanged.AlsoNotifyForAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String[])
member.param: A property that will be notified for.
The properties that will be notified for.

member.name: T:PropertyChanged.FilterTypeAttribute
member.summary: Defines filters on which types to include in the weaving process. These filters are Regex based and are matched against the Type.FullName

member.name: M:PropertyChanged.FilterTypeAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.param: The filter to apply to the types in this assembly. Matching is done by the Regex.IsMatch method using the Type.FullName as input for the Matching method.

member.name: T:PropertyChanged.DependsOnAttribute
member.summary: Injects this property to be notified when a dependent property is set.

member.name: M:PropertyChanged.DependsOnAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.param: A property that the assigned property depends on.

member.name: M:PropertyChanged.DependsOnAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String[])
member.param: A property that the assigned property depends on.
The properties that the assigned property depends on.

member.name: T:PropertyChanged.DoNotNotifyAttribute
member.summary: Exclude a or property from notification.

member.name: T:PropertyChanged.DoNotCheckEqualityAttribute
member.summary: Skip equality check before change notification

member.name: T:PropertyChanged.DoNotSetChangedAttribute
member.summary: Exclude a or property from IsChanged flagging.

member.name: T:PropertyChanged.ImplementPropertyChangedAttribute
member.summary:
Specifies that PropertyChanged Notification will be added to a class.
PropertyChanged.Fody will weave the interface and implementation into the class. When the value of a property changes, the PropertyChanged notification will be raised automatically
see https://github.com/Fody/PropertyChanged (link) for more information.
